subtitle: An economical dish to make for the family.

method.text: Melt the butter in a pan. Stir in flour and cook for 2 min. Gradually stir in milk. Bring to boil, stirring and simmer until thickened. Stir in cheese until melted. Season to taste.
Fold tuna and corn into cheese sauce. Pour into a greased ovenproof dish. Arrange tomato slices on top and sprinkle over the crisps.
Bake for about 20 min or until top is brown and crisp. Serve hot.

title: Crispy tuna bake
